targets.query: SELECT bytes_egress,bytes_ingress,country FROM "country:traffic" WHERE ("ifid" = '7') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY country fill(null)
SELECT mean("num_flows") FROM "autogen"."iface:ndpi_flows" WHERE ("ifid" = '7') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "protocol" fill(null) ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("bytes"), 1s) * 8 FROM "autogen"."iface:traffic" WHERE ("ifid" = '7') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_rcvd"), 10s) FROM "vlan:traffic" WHERE ("vlan" = '0' AND "ifid" = '7') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT mean("bytes_egress") FROM "host:l4protos" WHERE ("l4proto" = 'tcp' OR "l4proto" = 'select tag value') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes"), 1s)  *8 FROM "autogen"."iface:traffic" WHERE ("ifid" = '0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_rcvd"), 1s) *8 AS "$_device", non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) *8 AS "S0-01-to-Fortigate (OUT)" FROM "snmp_if:traffic" WHERE ("device" = '192.168.0.61' AND "if_index" = '49') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
